document.full_text: morgan stanley  launched its first yuan-denominated private equity fund in china on wednesday, saying it aimed to raise 1.5 billion yuan ($230 million).
document.title: morgan stanley aims to raise 1.5 billion yuan in china pe fund
lines_and_colors: morgan stanley  launched its first yuan-denominated private equity fund in china on wednesday, saying it aimed to raise 1.5 billion yuan ($230 million).
